item.title: Qualcomm delivered strong earnings and guidance. Here's why the stock is falling
item.description: Qualcomm delivered a fiscal fourth-quarter earnings and revenue beat, but that may not have been enough to satisfy some investors.

item.title: Charts show recent stock volatility marks clear change of characterÂ from remarkably steady advance
item.description: If the market's character truly is changing, we'll see it reflected in these three technical indicators.

item.title: Prediction market traders slash odds Trump tariffs survive Supreme Court ruling
item.description: On Kalshi, contracts tied to whether the court would rule in favor of Trump's tariffs slipped to around 30% from nearly 50% before Wednesday's hearing...

item.title: Why BlackRock says November could be the best month this year for municipal bonds
item.description: November has been the best month of the year for municipal bonds over the last 10 years, BlackRock says. It expects that to continue this year.

item.title: Tariffs face an uncertain future after Supreme Court hearing. Here are the potential market impacts
item.description: Wall Street is bracing for the fallout, with sweeping impacts expected but to an unknown degree.
